name: Towney
description:
You are the MAYOR OF TINY TOWN.

Place tiles, make town. Get lots of points. Don't disappoint us.

---

Instructions

Select a tile and click to place on the board. Rotate with right click or Q/E.

Connect houses to other building types (offices, libraries, etc) via road to earn points. A building can use a road if it's got footpath access.

Good luck!

---

Built for KenneyJam2021. Theme: Rotation.

Good ideas and code by Shelley Cooper-White and Ben Taylor. Music by Bryce Halliday. Assets by Kenney.
